name: Web Bomic Collect
body:
### Welcome to the Web Bomic Collect Site
This site will give you everything you need to know to get up and running as smoothly as possible on Web Bomic Collect. 
The key features of Web Bomic Collect are:

-  Web Bomic Collect allows Substance Misuse services around the UK to spend less time writing case notes and in turn provides a more efficient way of working

-  Capture data in outreach setting securely 

-  Reduction in transcription errors as all data is uploaded electronically

-  Eradicates inputting data into Web Bomic Core system from paper notes

-  Less money spent on travel expenses going to and from the office

-  More secure method of data capture

-  All data is fully encrypted and no identifiable information is on the tablet

-  Tablet can only be accessed by a specific user with a username and password

-  Allows services to see more clients in less time, and ensure time with the client is of a better quality

#####  Web Bomic Collect Documentation

Within the site you will find the folling documentation for Web Bomic Collect:

- [Release Notes](https://blithe.sharepoint.com/blithedocs/_layouts/15/WopiFrame.aspx?sourcedoc={EEBCEA46-0735-4337-B42D-0495582472D8}&file=Web%20Bomic%20Collect%20Release%20Notes.doc&action=default)
- [Test Summary](https://blithe.sharepoint.com/blithedocs/_layouts/15/WopiFrame.aspx?sourcedoc={51338805-B7CD-40AC-A1BC-26FB381EE540}&file=Web%20Bomic%20Collect%20Test%20Summary.doc&action=default)
- [Acceptance Document](https://blithe.sharepoint.com/blithedocs/_layouts/15/WopiFrame.aspx?sourcedoc={873BA009-FA6C-45CE-A160-73AB1EC0083F}&file=Web%20Bomic%20Collect%20Acceptance%20document.doc&action=default)
- [User Guide](https://blithe.sharepoint.com/blithedocs/_layouts/15/WopiFrame.aspx?sourcedoc={5B5E0FDE-FD85-40C0-9B43-48077CD4854D}&file=Web%20Bomic%20Collect%20User%20Guide.doc&action=default)

###  Web Bomic Collect Videos

There are currently two videos for Web Bomic Collect.  The first video is an Overview of what Web Bomic Collect is and what it will be good for and the second is a quick description of how to Add an Event in Web Bomic Collect and then view in Web Bomic Core.

- [Web Bomic Collect Overview](https://blithe.sharepoint.com/blithedocs/_layouts/15/Lightbox.aspx?url=https%3A%2F%2Fblithe.sharepoint.com%2Fblithedocs%2FReleases%2FWeb%2520Bomic%2FWeb%2520Bomic%2520Collect%2520%28In%2520Progress%2520-%2520Changes%2520Needed%29%2FWeb%2520Bomic%2520Collect%2520Video%2520-%2520Overview.mp4)

- [Web Bomic Collect - Add Event](https://blithe.sharepoint.com/blithedocs/_layouts/15/Lightbox.aspx?url=https%3A%2F%2Fblithe.sharepoint.com%2Fblithedocs%2FReleases%2FWeb%2520Bomic%2FWeb%2520Bomic%2520Collect%2520%28In%2520Progress%2520-%2520Changes%2520Needed%29%2FWeb%2520Bomic%2520Collect%2520Video%2520-%2520Add%2520Event.mp4)

###  Support or Contact

If you have any questions or would like further information on Web Bomic Collect, call Blithe on: 01283 722150 or email helpdesk@blithesystems.com
